Q: What is a component in React?
A: A component is a part of the web page that is interactive or designed using React

Q: What does useState do in React?
A: Use state effectively as it would in the class-based react, state is used when the value will change, props is used when the value will not change

Q: What is the purposes of properties with React components?
A: The purpose of properties is to pass components values that will not change
